subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Cavaliers beat the Clippers to avoid passing the 1976-77 Tampa Bay Buccaneers of the N.F.L. for the longest losing streak among North America’s four major professional sports.
snippet: The Cavaliers beat the Clippers to avoid passing the 1976-77 Tampa Bay Buccaneers of the N.F.L. for the longest losing streak among North America’s four major professional sports.
